item.title: CudaSafeCall application snippet
item.description: It is a good tone to check CUDA API errors while calling cudaMalloc() and other functions. It also helps to find floating bugs caused by hardware (lack of memory, etc). I provide below an adapted version of CudaSafeCall I found many weeks ago in the Internet. Simply remove #define CUDA_ERROR_CHECK in production if unneeded.
